# Valuit Securities Project

Valuit Securities project is a POC for liquidity of assets into ERC1400 Security tokens.

Mumbai Matic Network
--------------------
Gamma :

Mirror Token deployed to : 0xAd048CC0b433D30Ab416A93B2339063c36f48fB4
Valuit Security Token deployed to : 0xD836EedD29D27aF1F0ee6f571278eB82CCF9E8bc
Crowdsale Contract deployed to : 0x97c245336F86742De787377c5Db9041be54ed264

hh verify --network mumbai --constructor-args arguments.js 0xD836EedD29D27aF1F0ee6f571278eB82CCF9E8bc --contract contracts/SecurityToken.sol:SecurityToken
hh verify --network mumbai --constructor-args argumentsMirrorToken.js 0xAd048CC0b433D30Ab416A93B2339063c36f48fB4 --contract contracts/MirrorToken.sol:MirrorToken
hh verify --network mumbai --constructor-args argumentsCrowdsale.js 0x97c245336F86742De787377c5Db9041be54ed264 --contract contracts/SecurityCrowdsale.sol:SecurityCrowdsale

Stella :

Mirror Token deployed to : 0x35e295eCA8928463ac8EC13A80Bf7e29baB2fFA9
Valuit Security Token deployed to : 0x994f60079eDCb05cF1346B0aA3E05Ec7612481e6
Crowdsale Contract deployed to : 0x6895466472bcFc10B8DdF77905B0f6186998a7b3

hh verify --network mumbai --constructor-args arguments.js 0x994f60079eDCb05cF1346B0aA3E05Ec7612481e6 --contract contracts/SecurityToken.sol:SecurityToken
hh verify --network mumbai --constructor-args argumentsMirrorToken.js 0x35e295eCA8928463ac8EC13A80Bf7e29baB2fFA9 --contract contracts/MirrorToken.sol:MirrorToken
hh verify --network mumbai --constructor-args argumentsCrowdsale.js 0x6895466472bcFc10B8DdF77905B0f6186998a7b3 --contract contracts/SecurityCrowdsale.sol:SecurityCrowdsale

Luna :

Mirror Token deployed to : 0x0297F03f2e2C1AD7850617D5d1ED3Dd240a9aD83
Valuit Security Token deployed to : 0x885498E3249977CB80281D988EFfd807f34B632d
Crowdsale Contract deployed to : 0x13B54376a6955ff590cB5E421D00d2E94529c119

Polaris :

Mirror Token deployed to : 0x7013248B2180bD02ef1dFFFFF6194aDdfaE21288
Valuit Security Token deployed to : 0x3D3C1Ba869b581fF20dD0E56f001f6261bB79ba4
Crowdsale Contract deployed to : 0x53145f880349Ef247b364c2C27eF4170B1Cf31D4

hh verify --network mumbai --constructor-args arguments.js 0x6bD2Ad86d74496881e48Ea671351e2CA45a64e49 --contract contracts/SecurityToken.sol:SecurityToken
hh verify --network mumbai --constructor-args argumentsMirrorToken.js 0x84eb19B9148FdA834e4AE977F4782D47A99235Aa --contract contracts/MirrorToken.sol:MirrorToken
hh verify --network mumbai --constructor-args argumentsCrowdsale.js 0x3daa51B759c6f39Ac7E3A597d2056c5720D9A9D4 --contract contracts/SecurityCrowdsale.sol:SecurityCrowdsale
